level.heading: Multi-material recycling buy-back centers and intermediate processing facilities.

level.text: The Mayor shall establish, on or before October 1, 1989, at least 1 multi-material buy-back center in the District, which shall be publicly or privately operated and pay the public for recyclable materials.

The Mayor shall establish at least 1 intermediate processing facility in the District to receive recyclable materials designated for source separation pursuant to this subchapter and any other recyclable materials designated by the Mayor.
